p: To measure the impact of NP genotype on VLP production ( Figure 4C), we co-expressed NLuc-VP40 and NP-R111 or NP mutants (R111C, R111E, K109E/K110E/R111E, ΔC50—a 50 amino acid truncation of the NP C-terminus [ 35]) or eGFP control. rANOVA revealed significant day-to-day (replicate-to-replicate) variability, so we normalized all NLuc intensities within each replicate to each replicate’s NP-R111 value. We performed Dunnett’s post-test with the NP-R111 group removed (since variance and degrees of freedom of NP-R111 are both 0 after normalization) and compared each NP mutant or eGFP versus 1 to generate corrected p-values using the ‘ncDunnett’ package in R [ 69].
